attributes.action: FORCE NOTTINGHAM CITY COUNCIL TO UBLICLY APOLOGISE TO THE VICTIMS OF THEIR CURRENT CHILD ABUSE SCANDAL
attributes.additional_details: I WISH THE HOME OFFICE MINISTER TO DEMAND A PUBLIC ENQUIRY INTO THE CURRENT NOTTINGHAM POLICE OPERATION DAYBREAK AND FOR THE LEADER OF NOTTINGHAM CITY COUNCIL JON COLLINS TO PERSONALLY APOLOGISE TO THE VICTIMS AND FOR NOTTINGHAM CITY COUNCIL TO OFFER IMMEDIATE SUPPORT TO THE VICTIMS WITHOUT HAVING TO GET LEGAL ADVICE TO GET JUSTICE
